rukus.text: 33|21|Abasya'i tomadera jan'ya rayeche rasulullahara madhye uttama ardasa [1], tara jan'ya ye asa rakhe allah o sesa dinera ebam allah‌ke besi smarana kare.

33|22|Ara muminagana yakhana sam'milita bahinike dekhala, tara bale uthala, ’eta to ta'i, allah o tamra rasula yara pratisruti amaderake diyechilena ebam allah o tamra rasula satya'i balechena.' Ara ete tadera imana o anugatya'i brd'dhi pela.

33|23|Muminadera madhye ke'u ke'u allah‌ra sathe tadera kara angikara purna kareche, tadera ke'u ke'u (angikara purna kare) mara geche [1] ebam ke'u ke'u pratiksaya rayeche. Tara tadera angikara kono paribartana kareni
33|24|yate allah puraskrta karena satyabadiderake tadera satyabaditara jan'ya ebam sasti dena munaphikaderake yadi tini cana athaba tadera ksama karena. Niscaya allah ksamasila, parama dayalu.
33|25|Ara allah kaphiraderake trud'dhabasthaya phiriye dilena, tara kono kalyana labha kareni. Ara yud'dhe muminadera jan'ya allahi yathesta ebam allah sarbasaktimana, prabala parakramasali.

33|26|Ara kitabidera [1] madhye yara taderake sahayya karechila, taderake tini tadera durga hate abatarana karalena ebam tadera antare bhiti sancara karalena; tomara tadera kichu sankhyakake hatya karacha ebam kichu sankhyakake karacha bandi [2].
33|27|Ara tini tomaderake adhikari karalena tadera bhumi, gharabari o dhana - sampadera ebam emana bhumira yate tomara ekhano padarpana karani [1]. Ara allah sabakichura upara purna ksamatabana.
